FTBufferGlyph Class Reference

#include <FTBufferGlyph.h>

Inheritance diagram for FTBufferGlyph:

Detailed Description

FTBufferGlyph is a specialisation of FTGlyph for creating pixmaps.

See also:
FTGlyphContainer
